long_description: Treat yourself to a hearty breakfast that includes eggs from Backpacker's Pantry! Easy to prepare-just mix contents with water and cook in a greased pan over low heat. A quick and easy breakfast gives you energy for camping or backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Treat yourself to a hearty breakfast that includes eggs from Backpacker's Pantry!
